main.name: Michael DeSocio
main.description: Michael DeSocio is a Senior at the University at Albany, SUNY, obtaining a B.S. in Cybersecurity from the College of Emergency Preparedness, Homeland Security, and Cybersecurity.
main.bio: Michael DeSocio grew up just outside the Capital Region of New York.  Michael grew up around technology and has always tried to surround himself with knowledge and people that can help him expand on what he has learned. While attending SUNY Albany, Michael participates in the Cyber Defense Organization; a student run organization, focused on building technical knowledge in the fields of information technology and cybersecurity.  Michael has been heavily invested in expanding his knowledge and working with new technologies. In his free time, Michael enjoys expanding his knowledge utilizing his home lab and cloud providers along with, woodworking, and staying involved in his high schoolâ€™s music program.

resume.skillmessage: Basic knowledge in Python and HTML.  Current interests are in Open Source software such as PFSense, TrueNAS, and other sources. My current networking skills are self taught and are based on the use of Layer 2 managed networking gear and open source firewalls like pfSense and OPNSense.  I am looking for an internship to expand my knowledge of routing and switching in a larger, corporate or enterprise domain.
